00062 namespace phys
00063 {
00064     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00065     /// @class TypedConstraint
00066     /// @headerfile constraint.h
00067     /// @brief This is the base class for all constraints supported.
00068     /// @details This class provides the basis for all the other constraints.  This is
00069     /// also a virtual class and provides no constraint properties of it's own, thus
00070     /// shouldn't/can't be called on manually.
00071     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00072     class TypedConstraint
00073     {
00074         protected:
00075             friend class World;
00076             friend class PhysicsManager;
00077             /// @brief First rigid body the constraint applies to.
00078             btRigidBody* BodyA;
00079             /// @brief Second rigid body the constraint applies to(if applicable).
00080             btRigidBody* BodyB;
00081             /// @brief Bullet constraint that this class encapsulates.
00082             btTypedConstraint* ConstraintBase;
00083         public:
00084             /// @brief No initialization constructor.
00085             /// @details The no initialization class constructor.
00086             TypedConstraint();
00087             /// @brief Class destructor.
00088             /// @details The class destructor.
00089             virtual ~TypedConstraint();
00090             /// @brief Two body constructor.
00091             /// @details This constructor is used when the applicable constraint is applied to two bodies, as opposed to a point a world space.
00092             /// @param bodya First actor to be applied to.
00093             /// @param bodyb Second actor to be applied to.
00094             TypedConstraint(ActorRigid* bodya, ActorRigid* bodyb);
00095             /// @brief One body constructor.
00096             /// @details This constructor is used when the applicable constraint is applied to a body and a point in world space.
00097             /// @param bodya The actor to be constraint to a point in world space.
00098             TypedConstraint(ActorRigid* bodya);
00099             virtual void SetParam(int num, Real value, int axis=-1) = 0;
00100             virtual Real GetParam(int num, int axis=-1) = 0;
00101     };
00102 
00103     class ConeTwistConstraint: public TypedConstraint
00104     {
00105         protected:
00106             /// @brief Bullet constraint that this class encapsulates.
00107             btConeTwistConstraint* ConeTwist;
00108         public:
00109             ConeTwistConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA, Vector3 Vectorb, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB);
00110             ConeTwistConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, Vector3 VectorA, Quaternion QuaternionA);
00111             /// @brief Internal constructor.
00112             /// @details Constructs this class around a pre-built bullet constraint.  This is an internal only constructor and shouldn't be called manually.
00113             /// @param Constraint The constraint to be constructed around.
00114             ConeTwistConstraint(btConeTwistConstraint* Constraint);
00115             /// @brief Class destructor.
00116             /// @details The class destructor.
00117             virtual ~ConeTwistConstraint();
00118             void SetAngularOnly(bool AngularOnly);
00119             void SetLimit(int LimitIndex, Real LimitValue);
00120             void SetLimit(Real SwingSpan1, Real SwingSpan2, Real Twistspan, Real Softness=1.0, Real BiasFactor=0.3, Real RelaxationFactor=1.0);
00121             void SetDamping(Real Damping);
00122             void SetMaxMotorImpulse(Real MaxMotorImpulse);
00123             void SetMaxMotorImpulseNormalized(Real MaxMotorImpulse);
00124             void SetFixThresh(Real FixThresh);
00125             void SetMotorTarget(Quaternion Quat);
00126             void SetMotorTargetInConstraintSpace(Quaternion Quat);
00127             void EnableMotor(bool Enable);
00128             bool IsPassedSwingLimit();
00129             virtual void SetParam(int num, Real value, int axis=-1);
00130             virtual Real GetParam(int num, int axis=-1);
00131     };

00133     class Generic6DofConstraint: public TypedConstraint
00134     {
00135         protected:
00136             /// @brief Bullet constraint that this class encapsulates.
00137             btGeneric6DofConstraint* Generic6dof;
00138         public:
00139             /// @brief No initialization constructor.
00140             /// @details The no initialization class constructor.
00141             Generic6DofConstraint();
00142             /// @brief Inheritance constructor.
00143             /// @details This constructor exists for passing values down the inheritance tree from derived classes.  Should not be called on manually.
00144             /// @param ActorA First actor to have the constraint applied to.
00145             /// @param ActorB Second actor to have the constraint applied to.
00146             Generic6DofConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB);
00147             Generic6DofConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA, Vector3 VectorB, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB, bool UseLinearReferenceA);
00148             Generic6DofConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 Vectorb, Quaternion QuaternionB, bool UseLinearReferenceB);
00149             /// @brief Internal constructor.
00150             /// @details Constructs this class around a pre-built bullet constraint.  This is an internal only constructor and shouldn't be called manually.
00151             /// @param Constraint The constraint to be constructed around.
00152             Generic6DofConstraint(btGeneric6DofConstraint* Constraint);
00153             /// @brief Class destructor.
00154             /// @details The class destructor.
00155             virtual ~Generic6DofConstraint();
00156             void SetOffsetALocation(Vector3 Location);
00157             void SetOffsetBLocation(Vector3 Location);
00158             void SetLinearUpperLimit(Vector3 Limit);
00159             void SetLinearLowerLimit(Vector3 Limit);
00160             void SetAngularUpperLimit(Vector3 Limit);
00161             void SetAngularLowerLimit(Vector3 Limit);
00162             void SetUseFrameOffset(bool UseOffset);
00163             void SetLimit(int Axis, Real Low, Real High);
00164             void CalculateTransforms();
00165             virtual void SetParam(int num, Real value, int axis=-1);
00166             virtual Real GetParam(int num, int axis=-1);
00167     };

00174         public:

00177             /// @details This constructor exists for passing values down the inheritance tree from derived classes.  Should not be called on manually.
00178             /// @param ActorA First actor to have the constraint applied to.
00179             /// @param ActorB Second actor to have the constraint applied to.
00180             Generic6DofSpringConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB);
00181             Generic6DofSpringConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA, Vector3 VectorB, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB, bool UseLinearReferenceA);
00182             /// @brief Internal constructor.
00183             /// @details Constructs this class around a pre-built bullet constraint.  This is an internal only constructor and shouldn't be called manually.
00184             /// @param Constraint The constraint to be constructed around.
00185             Generic6DofSpringConstraint(btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint* Constraint);
00186             /// @brief Class destructor.
00187             /// @details The class destructor.
00188             ~Generic6DofSpringConstraint();
00189             void SetStiffness(int Index, Real Stiffness);
00190             void SetDamping(int Index, Real Damping);
00191             void SetEquilibriumPoint(int Index);
00192             void EnableSpring(int Index, bool Enable);
00193     };
